metadata.note: These are genericized sample questions. Full proprietary question bank available to winning team under NDA.

questions.question: Why is this therapy so expensive compared to existing treatments?
questions.context: Physician managing cost-conscious patient population in community setting

questions.question: The incremental survival benefit doesn't justify the cost. How do you respond?
questions.context: Academic physician reviewing clinical trial data with cost-effectiveness lens

questions.question: My patients can't afford these copays. What patient assistance exists?
questions.context: Community physician with underinsured patient population

questions.question: What are the latest real-world data findings for this treatment?
questions.context: Evidence-focused physician wanting to see data beyond clinical trials

questions.question: Is there any data supporting use in combination with other therapies?
questions.context: Physician considering combination treatment approaches

questions.question: Your trial excluded elderly patients. How do I know this works for my population?
questions.context: Community physician with predominantly elderly patient base

questions.question: How reliable is your data without a placebo or sham control?
questions.context: Academic physician scrutinizing trial methodology

questions.question: My patients don't want this therapy. What's the experience in other centers?
questions.context: Physician concerned about patient willingness to accept treatment

questions.question: I cannot imagine patients would accept such a burdensome treatment regimen.
questions.context: Physician evaluating treatment burden against potential benefits

questions.question: How should we deal with patients who don't have adequate caregiver support?
questions.context: Physician in community setting with limited support resources

questions.question: Aren't we just adding to patient suffering with this intervention?
questions.context: Physician concerned about quality of life in advanced disease

questions.question: I don't have time for this! The treatment decision is complex enough already.
questions.context: Time-pressed physician in busy clinical practice

questions.question: The administrative burden is huge. Is there a way to make this easier?
questions.context: Private practice physician concerned about operational impact

questions.question: How can I keep track of patients on this therapy with my current workload?
questions.context: Busy physician managing large patient panel

questions.question: If this therapy works on the disease, how do you explain the negative results in your Phase 3 trial?
questions.context: Academic physician analyzing seemingly contradictory data

questions.question: The study design seems flawed. Can you walk me through the methodology?
questions.context: Skeptical academic physician scrutinizing trial design

questions.question: Can patients with pacemakers or other implanted devices use this therapy?
questions.context: Physician managing patients with comorbidities and implanted devices

questions.question: How long do patients have to continue treatment? When can they stop?
questions.context: Physician planning long-term treatment strategy

questions.question: How does a localized therapy work in metastatic disease?
questions.context: Oncologist questioning mechanism in advanced disease state

questions.question: This seems too simple to work. What's the actual mechanism of action?
questions.context: Skeptical physician questioning novel therapeutic approach

Cost & Value.description: Questions about pricing, reimbursement, and economic value

Clinical Data & Evidence.description: Questions about trial data, real-world evidence, and clinical effectiveness

Patient Acceptance & Treatment Burden.description: Questions about patient willingness, treatment burden, and quality of life

Clinical Decision-Making & Time Constrai.description: Questions about workflow, time constraints, and practice integration

Data Validity & Study Design.description: Questions about trial methodology and data interpretation

Treatment Practicality.description: Questions about treatment logistics, duration, and patient eligibility

Skepticism & Pushback.description: Questions expressing general skepticism or disbelief
